menu.offer: Do you like the bot? Give me a coffee!
menu.continueParticipating: I want to continue to participate

error.errorWithCreationOfCustomMenu: Error while the creation of the custom menu'.
error.inlineKeyboardIsRequired: You must specify an inline keyboard to sent.
error.cantUnderstandTypeOfChat: I can't recognize the type of chat.
error.textIsRequired: The message to be sent is required.
error.cantGetNameOfUser: Error while reading the names of users.
error.errorWhileUserRegistrationInGroup: Error while registration user in group.
error.errorWhileUserAssociate: Error while registration user to coffee.
error.cantUnderstandMessage: If you write like this I can't understand you. Use the buttons below.
error.errorWhileDestroyCoffee: Error while deleting of paid coffee
error.errorWhileDestroyAllCoffee: Error while deleting of all paid coffee
error.errorWhileGettingName: Error while getting list of benefactor
error.cantAddBenefactor: You can't add benefactor on coffee that are setting from others.
error.cantAddCoffeeToYourself: You're alone! You can't register a coffee to yourself
error.cantAddCoffeeThereIsOneUser: You can't register a new coffee because i found only one person.
error.pendingChooseBenefactor: You have a pending add coffee operation. Cancel it to continue to chat with the bot.
error.cantDoOperationOnOtherCoffee: You can't do an operation on coffee which is set by other. You lout.
error.cantGoBack: Can't go back because I don't understand where you at.
error.cantAddCoffeeNow: You can't do it now. There's already someone who is adding a coffee.
error.mustWaitToAddCoffee: You have to wait for him to finish and only after you can register a new coffee.
error.dontFindAspiringBenefactor: I don't find any aspiring benefactors..Something went wrong.
error.checkCoffeeSpecificGroup: Error while checking existence coffee in a specific group
error.addPeopleToCoffee: Error while adding an user to coffee.
error.newPaidCoffee: Error while adding a new coffee.
error.registerEmptyField: Error while registration user. The fields are null.
error.notEnoughUser: There is no one who is participating in the game
error.cantHaveKeyboard: Seems like that you're not participating in the games, right?

general.moreInfo: Use the buttons below to learn more
general.listsOfYourGroup: This is the list of your groups
general.notParticipatingToGame: You aren't participating in the game
general.notParticipatingToGame1: You aren't participating in the game
general.participatingToGame: You are participating in the game
general.participatingToGame1: You are participating in the game
general.changeGroupState: Tap on group to change his settings
general.excludeFromChooseBenefactor: From this moment you will no longer included during the extraction of benefactor.
general.includedInChooseBenefactor: From this moment you will longer included during the extraction of benefactor.
general.youChoseToLeaveGame: You've chose to leave the game in the group
general.youChoseToPlayIn: You've chose to join the game in the group
general.thereAreActiveUsers: I think that there are already active users.
general.whatDoYouWantToDoWithOlderConfiguration: What do you want to do with the older configuration?
general.keepOlderConfiguration: => The older active users must confirm again their willingness to participate to the game
general.resetOlderConfiguration: => All the participants will be deleted. Each participant in the group will have to subscribe again his willingness to join in the game.
general.changedKeyboard: I've also changed your keyboard to make you feel at home. Have fun!

ui.initialText: Every day, together, we can decide who is the big hearted who offers to pay the coffee!
ui.initialText1: Here below you can find the buttons with which you can give me orders.
ui.initialText2: Are you ready to start? Ok, let's go!
ui.infoBot: PS: You can find all useful information about the bot by
ui.botAlreadyStarted: You have already started the bot
ui.sendSomeButtons: I send you some buttons if you want me to help you with something.
ui.giveMeTips: Suggestions are welcome, if you had someone send me by
ui.resetGroupIsOk: The reset of the group was successful.
ui.sayHi: Who wants to participate must say hi to me through the button below.
ui.askHimToStart: Please ask him to get started.
ui.haveYouBackWithUs: what a plaseure to have you back again with us!
ui.rememberYouCanRejoinGames: Remember you can always choose to rejoin the game by enabling the group via the button below
ui.sendYouAMessageIfYouChangeIdea: i sent you one private message with a small reminder if you change idea.
ui.beforeStartConfirmConfiguration: Ok, before starting i need of the confirmation of each sigle player.
ui.pleaseAnswerMeYourIntentions: please answer me with your intentions
ui.amongBenefactorThereAre: Among the aspiring benefactors there are
ui.benefactorIs: The benefactor of this coffee is
ui.manageGroupSettings: Ok, handle the group settings here
ui.iLikeYouToo1: If you use the button below we can even engage
ui.resetAll: You're for resetting all the participate of the user in the group
ui.resetDone: Ok! You've correctly reset the settings of the group
ui.restartTogether: If you want we can start together again! Use the botton below
